Html:
Hi,

I have a chart, and in the chart  are some LineSeries. Now I want a AreaSerie which is colored only between two different LineSeries.

I tried that but the the AreaSeries start always at bottom of the chart and I don't know how I can start at a LineSerie.

This picture illustrates want I want:

http://peltiertech.com/Excel/pix3/XYAreaChart31.gif
